# project-root/Server/python_api/documents/sample.txt
MongoDB is a NoSQL database that stores data in JSON-like documents. It is known for its flexibility and scalability.
React is a declarative, efficient, and flexible JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It lets you compose complex UIs from small and isolated pieces of code called "components."
Express is a fast, unopinionated, minimalist web framework for Node.js. It provides a robust set of features for web and mobile applications.
FAISS (Facebook AI Similarity Search) is a library for efficient similarity search and clustering of dense vectors. It is commonly used for building retrieval systems.
Sentence-Transformers is a Python framework for state-of-the-art sentence, text, and image embeddings. It simplifies the process of generating high-quality embeddings.

Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) is a technique that enhances the capabilities of large language models by allowing them to retrieve information from a knowledge base before generating a response. This helps ensure the LLM provides factual and up-to-date answers.
